messages.messageBody:
I didn't see the pictures :-), first sentence I wrote...

I'm not sure where they were posted. I know there are a couple of fake
Munechika floating around and was worried it was one.

- darcy

messages.subject: information on my sword.
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, my name is Rob,im a new member.,Can someone help me with the name on my sword? SANJYO KOKAJI MUNEIE.,This may not be right.,Thats all I have to go
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
my name is Rob,im a new member.,Can someone help me with the name
on my sword? SANJYO KOKAJI MUNEIE.,This may not be right.,Thats all I
have to go on.What period is the sword smith?
I put pictures in Rob S photos and two old tsuba pictures as well.
